verses.1: Adamʼ ta Seth, Sethʼ ta Enosh,
verses.2: Enoshʼ ta Kenan, Kenanʼ ta Mahalalel, Mahalalelʼ ta Jared,
verses.3: Jaredʼ ta Enok, Enokʼ ta Methuselah, Methuselahʼ ta Lamek,
verses.4: Lamekʼ ta Noah ahi hi. Noah in tapa thum nei a, tuate pen Shem, Ham le Jafeth ahi uh hi.
verses.5: Jafethʼ tapate: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshek le Tiras hi a, amauʼ min ciat pua-in minam tuamtuam a piang hi.
verses.6: Gomerʼ suante: Ashkenaz mite, Rifath mite le Togarmah mite ahi uh hi.
verses.7: Javanʼ suante: Elishah mite, Tarshish mite, Kittim mite le Rodanim mite ahi uh hi.
verses.8: Hamʼ tapate: Kush, Egypt, Put le Kanaan hi a, amauʼ min ciat pua-in minam a piang hi.
verses.9: Kushʼ suante: Seba mite, Havilah mite, Sabta mite, Raamah mite le Sabteka mite ahi uh hi. Raamahʼ suante: Sheba mite le Dedan mite ahi uh hi.
verses.10: Kush in Nimrod kici tapa khat nei a, leitungah amah a vanglian masa pen ahi hi.
verses.11: Egypt pen Lud mite, Anam mite, Lehab mite, Naftuh mite,
verses.12: Pathrus mite, Kasluh mite (Filistia miteʼ hong pianna) le Kaftor miteʼ pianna pupi ahi hi.
verses.13: Kanaan pen a tacil Sidon le Heth,
verses.14: le Jebus mite, Amor mite, Girgash mite,
verses.15: Hiv mite, Arka mite, Sin mite,
verses.16: Arvad mite, Zemari mite le Hamath miteʼ pianna pa ahi hi.
verses.17: Shemʼ tapate: Elam, Asshur, Arpakshad, Lud, Aram, Uz, Hul, Gether le Meshek hi a, amauʼ min ciat pua-in minam a piang hi.
verses.18: Arpakshad pen Shelahʼ pa hi a, Shelah pen Eberʼ pa ahi hi.
verses.19: Eberʼ sung pan a piang tapa nihte: A khat paʼ min Peleg ahi hi (bang hang hiam cih leh ama hunin gam kikhen hi). A sanggampaʼ min Joktan ahi hi.
verses.20: Joktan pen Almodad mite, Shelef mite, Hazarmaveth mite, Jerah mite,
verses.21: Hadoram mite, Uzal mite, Diklah mite,
verses.22: Ebal mite, Abimael mite, Sheba mite,
verses.23: Ofir mite, Havilah mite le Jobab miteʼ pianna pa ahi hi. Hihte khempeuh, Joktanʼ suante ahi uh hi.
verses.26: Serug, Nahor le Terah hi a,
verses.27: tua ciangin Abraham a kici Abram ahi suk uh hi.
verses.28: Abrahamʼ tapate: Isaac le Ishmael ahi uh hi.
verses.29: Amauʼ khangsimna hih bang ahi hi: Ishmaelʼ tacil Nebaioth ahi hi. Tua ciangin Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam,
verses.31: Jetur, Nafish le Kedemah ahi uh hi. Hihte pen Ishmaelʼ tapate ahi uh hi.
verses.32: Abrahamʼ zineu Keturahʼ tapate: Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak le Shuah ahi uh hi. Jokshanʼ tapate: Sheba le Dedan ahi uh hi.
verses.33: Midianʼ tapate: Efah, Efer, Hanok, Abida le Eldaah ahi uh hi. Hihte khempeuh pen Keturahʼ suanlekhakte ahi uh hi.
verses.34: Abraham pen Isaacʼ pa ahi hi. Isaacʼ tapate Esau le Israel ahi uh hi.
verses.35: Esauʼ tapate: Elifaz, Reuel, Jeush, Jalam le Korah ahi uh hi.
verses.36: Elifazʼ tapate: Teman, Omar, Gatam, Kenaz, Timna le Amalek ahi uh hi.
verses.37: Reuelʼ tapate: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah le Mizzah ahi uh hi.
verses.38: Seirʼ tapate: Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Anah, Dishon, Ezer le Dishan ahi uh hi.
verses.39: Lotanʼ tapate Hori le Homam hi uh a, Lotanʼ sanggamnu pen Timna ahi hi.
verses.40: Shobalʼ tapate: Alian, Manahath, Ebal, Shefi le Onam ahi uh hi. Zibeonʼ tapate: Aiah le Anah ahi uh hi.
verses.41: Anahʼ tapa Dishon ahi hi. Dishonʼ tapate: Hamran, Eshban, Ithran le Kheran ahi uh hi.
verses.42: Ezerʼ tapate: Bilhan, Zaavan le Jaakan ahi uh hi. Dishanʼ tapate: Uz le Aran ahi uh hi.
verses.43: Israel-te tungah kumpi khat peuhpeuh in a uk ma-in Edom gam sungah a uk kumpite: Beorʼ tapa Bela hi a, ama khuapi min Dinhabah ahi hi.
verses.44: Bela a sih ciangin ama tangin Bozrah khuami Zerahʼ tapa Jobab in uk hi.
verses.45: Jobab a sih ciangin ama tangin Teman miteʼ gam mi Husham in uk hi.
verses.46: Husham a sih ciangin Moab gam sungah Midian mite a zopa, Bedadʼ tapa Hadad in ama tangin uk a, ama khuapi min Avith ahi hi.
verses.47: Hadad a sih ciangin ama tangin Masrekah khuami Samlah in uk hi.
verses.48: Samlah a sih ciangin ama tangin Eufratis gun gei-a om Rehoboth khuami Shaul in uk hi.
verses.49: Shaul a sih ciangin ama tangin Akborʼ tapa Baal-hanan in uk hi.
verses.50: Baal-hanan a sih ciangin ama tangin Hadad in uk hi. Ama khuapi min Pai hi a, ama ziʼ min Mehetabel hi a, Mezahabʼ tunu hi a, Matredʼ tanu ahi hi.
verses.51: Tua ciangin Hadad si hi. Edom ukpite: Ukpi Timna, Aliah, Jetheth,
verses.54: Magdiel le Iram hi uh a, hihte pen Edom ukpite ahi uh hi.
